caption.p: The inter- and intra-specific relative interaction index (RII) of G. quadriradiata. Culture type: Mix, Mixed culture; Mono, monoculture; Nitrogen and light treatments: N+Shade, elevated nitrogen and 65% shaded; N, elevated nitrogen and natural sunlight; Shade, ambient nitrogen and 65% shaded; Control, ambient nitrogen and natural sunlight. Values are means ± SE. Means with the same letter were not significantly different at an alpha level of 0.05.
